hero.info: a melee hero with special power of power buff with increasing attack point 4 units continuously

@val.name: Eagle
@val.info: has power buff, increases health point 10 units

@val.name: Leopard
@val.info: when it attacks a minion, next turn, minion's health point will be decreased 8 units

@val.name: Genie
@val.info: a continuous power buff, increases attack point 1 unit

@val.name: Area Dispel
@val.info: kills the negative buffs of your own cards and positive buffs of enemy cards in 2*2 area

@val.name: God Strength
@val.info: increases Attack Point of Hero 4 units

@val.name: Madness
@val.info: increases Attack Point 4 units, duration : 3, but the card will be disarmed

@val.name: Health With Profit
@val.info: 2 holy buffs, duration : 2, a weakness buff decreases health point 6 units

@val.name: Kings Guard
@val.info: it kills a random minion in hero surroundings

@val.name: Soul Eater
@val.info: on death of one of own cards, every own card gets power buff, increases attck point 1 unit

@val.name: Simorgh
@val.info: a melee hero with special power of stuning all enemy cards for 1 turn

@val.info: gives an own minion a power buff, it increases attack point 8 units , it gives weakness buff too, it decreases health point 6 units

@val.name: Shock
